message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_FV_INVOICE_AMOUNT_MUST_BE_GT_OR_EQ_TO_0
message.locale: The Amount Invoiced, %1n, must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_FV_UNIT_AMOUNT_MUST_BE_GT_OR_EQ_TO_0
message.locale: The Unit Amount, %1n, must be greater than or equal to 0.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_FV_NUMBER_OF_UNITS_MUST_BE_GT_0
message.locale: The Number of Units, %1n, must be greater than 0.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_FV_SERVICE_AUTH_REF_NUMBER_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Service Authorization Reference Number entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.
The Service Authorisation Reference Number entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_FV_SERVICE_OFFERING_NAME_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Service Name entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_FV_SERVICE_OFFERING_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The Service Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_CFV_UNIT_AMOUNT_REQUIRED_IF_INVOICE_AMOUNT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Unit Amount must be entered if Amount Invoiced is entered.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_CFV_INVOICE_AMOUNT_REQUIRED_IF_UNIT_AMOUNT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Amount Invoiced must be entered if the Unit Amount is entered.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_CFV_INVOICE_AMOUNT_MUST_EQUAL_UNIT_AMOUNT_BY_NUMBER_OF_UNITS
message.locale: The Amount Invoiced, %1n must equal Unit Amount, %2n, multiplied by Number of Units, %3n.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_FV_REQUEST_ID_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Service Invoice Request ID cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_CEV_REQUEST_STATUS_NOT_OPEN
message.locale: Line Items can only be added while Service Invoice Request status is %1c. Service Invoice Request status is currently %2c.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_MFV_SERVICE_INVOICE_REQUEST_ID_EMPTY
message.locale: Service Invoice Request ID is mandatory.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEINVOICEREQLINEITEM_XFV_EITHER_PROVIDER_REFNO_OR_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Either Provider Reference Number or Provider Name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEINVOICEREQLINEITEM_XFV_EITHER_CLIENT_REFNO_OR_OTHER_DTLS_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Either Client Reference Number or Client First Name, Client Last Name and Client Date of Birth must be specified.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_VALID
message.locale: The External Reference Number must belong to either a Provider or Provider Group.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_MODIFY_CANCELLED_RECORD
message.locale: This record has already been deleted, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_INVOICE_REQUEST_MUST_BE_OPEN
message.locale: The Service Invoice Request is %1c, Service Invoice Request Line Items cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_DELETE_LINE_ITEM_FROM_REQUEST
message.locale: The Service Invoice Request is %1c, Service Invoice Request Line Items cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEINVOICEREQLINEITEM_XRV_THIS_SERVICE_INVOICE_REQUEST_LINE_ITEM_MUST_HAVE_ATLEAST_ONE_CLIENT
message.locale: This service invoice request line item must have at least one client.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEINVOICEREQLINEITEM_XRV_THE_CLIENT_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The client already exists for this service invoice request line item, the client cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEINVOICELINEITEM_FV_SERVICE_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_TODAY_OR_EARLIER
message.locale: Service To Date, %1d , must be on or before today.
